mapper.sql: i.id, i.title, i.sell_point as sellPoint, i.price, i.num, i.barcode, i.image, i.cid, i.status, i.created, c.name as catName,DATE_FORMAT(i.updated,'%Y-%m-%d/%H:%i:%s') as updatedFormat, CASE i.status when 1 then "正常" when 2 then "下架" when 3 then "删除" else "未知" END as statusName
mapper.select: select count(1) from tb_item where status!=3

SELECT
FROM tb_item i LEFT JOIN tb_item_cat c ON i.cid = c.id where i.status !=3 ORDER BY i.id DESC LIMIT #{offset},#{rows}
